basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period August-November
basic.color: Flower color green white or with yellow, fruit color purple black

maintenance.soil: Deep fertile clay loam or neutral to slightly acidic sandy loam
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade
maintenance.fertilization: Top-dressing and weeding once every year in spring and winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
